cause.description:
Promote Africa, Inc is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that supports health, educational, and capacity building community development projects in Namibia by funding them with our Bright Ideas Grants.
We ask these communities with on-the-ground insights into daily challenges and hidden opportunities otherwise inaccessible to submit their own ideas for real potential solutions. With relevance and long-lasting community support built into the model, we are then able to apply our own evaluation criteria and provide seed capital to the very best of projects.
>>NEW PROJECTS! ((www.BrightIdeasGrant.com)) Include micro-enterprises to generate income and funds for community health/education, computer education for preschoolers and unemployed youth, and educational resource centres for children without local libraries.
1. “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.” - Nelson Mandela
cause.mission: We strive to improve health, education and economic opportunities in rural African communities in combatting long-term poverty.
cause.name: Promote Africa
